original_text: And they came into the midst of the house as if to get wheat, and they stabbed him in the stomach. Then Rechab and Baanah his brother escaped.
korean_text: 레갑과 그의 형제 바아나가 밀을 가지러 온 체하고 집 가운데로 들어가서 그의 배를 찌르고 도망하였더라

sentences.original_text: And they came into the midst of the house
and they stabbed him in the stomach
Then Rechab and Baanah his brother escaped
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 레갑과 그의 형 바아나가 도망했습니다
